entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 08:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 mm. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
